name: firebase_functions
description: - **On App (Parents/Drivers/Management):**     - Generate and retrieve the **FCM token** when the app is installed or opened.     - Store the token securely in the Firebase Realtime Database or Firestore:       - **Parents:** Save in each student’s collection under `parentTokens` array.       - **Drivers:** Save in the driver’s profile or collection.       - **Management:** Save in the admin’s profile.
